desc: I would like to have an android app that will communicate with a raspberry Pi for home automation. The app and the Pi should be synced at all times. The App needs to send a command to the Pi to switch on and off certain Pins.The android app should allow the user to edit the channel names that appear in order to list what is controlled by each button. This app should receive confirmation from the Pi if that actual raspberry Pi received the command or not.The pi script will need to always communicate with the app. If the Pi was switched off then the app should indicate that its off and once the Pi switches on again, the app should be able to remember and detect what the state of the appliance is (on/off).I have already started with the python script as well as the android app, I'll upload the files.
title: Raspberry Pi Home automation using an Android App

desc: I am looking to develop a consumer facing app to support a clients business. However, the app has 3 levels to it, consumer, staff and website.The app needs to be available on IoS (ipad, iphone and iwatch) and Android.To the consumer the app is a simple food diary based on daily food eaten. Ideally the app should not only search online food databased, but also should allow scanning of UK bar codes to search. Users will need to register or be invited to use the app to prevent anyone opening it and therefor unregistered users should just load a page advertising the clients business with simple text and maybe a video.To the staff, they should be able to login to the app and review a consumers diary, scoring their food. This score should then be displayed to the user whenever they want to see it.Finally, the web site should allow staff and conusmers to access all the same data as the app, but just from a web browser.I would also like the app to allow for direct messaging to and from consumers to staff privately as well as potentially booking of appointments.The app will only be only available in the UK and should be secure etc.
title: App for iOS, watch and Android

desc: XAMRIN FORMS IPHONE APP. This iPhone application is a simple inventory management tool, where tags are entered one at a time into a log as they are inspected, along with the current date, and the list of tags remaining to be inventoried is re-queried and displayed in a read only list on the page.Single page iphone app. 3 primary controls: Textbox, Submit button, list showing query results.  The backend for this project is already created on a cloud based SQL Server created via the Azure Portal.  A mockup image is attached.The form will function as follows: 1) a tag is entered into the textbox, and the user presses the submit button; 2) the code will append the tag and the current date into a table on the SQL server called ‘InspectionLog’, and 3) re-query the existing SQL Server view ‘vNOTinspectedtoday’, and return and display the view results on the page.App must be created in Xamrin Forms with Visual Studio.  All Visual Studio files as well as the built application will be turned over on payment at project completion.
title: Write an iPhone application

desc: Hello! I need an android emulator, with which I can install apps from different sources.It is necessary that applications can not determine that I'm using an emulator. The emulator must be protected from all known and potential ways of determining the emulator. (For example, here are these - [url removed, login to view],[url removed, login to view]). It should be possible to install the same application an unlimited number of times.The work can be done on the basis of an existing emulator. List of applications (if necessary), which I plan to install, I will provide after the start of cooperation.I ask you to take a responsible attitude to the decision on co-operation. If you are not sure that you will be able to complete the task before the moment when I show you the list of apps, I ask you to refuse the offer of cooperation.P / S. If you wish, please indicate your experience in performing similar tasks and which of the applications (or simply their technical characteristics) you can install on the emulator with a high degree of confidence so that they do not determine that it is an emulator. You can tell me the signs that I need to find in the applications that interest me, by which you can determine with a high degree of probability whether you can set up an emulator for them.
title: Anti-detect Android emulator
